name: Kyle Stewart
text: 10/10* and surpassed all expectations, which were high to begin with. Decor and atmosphere are perfect and the menu, wine list, and beer and cocktail menu were perfect. Our new favorite restaurant in Montgomery.

name: Emily Gayle
text: What an excellent place to go. Absolutely gorgeous atmosphere. The staff was the best I have had in Montgomery for service. The food was delicious. I absolutely recommend the crab cigar. The Brussel sprouts were the best I have ever had. I would return just for them. A definite go to!

name: Adi Toledano
text:
Good atmosphere and service.
Amazing meat, especially the short rib.
Great desert.
Not cheap, but worth it.

name: Cornelius Nunn
text: Always a great experience here. The best New York Strip I've ever had, and the best beignet outside of New Orleans.

name: Giuseppe Aguinaldo
text: Beautiful interior, fantastic food, and great service! We popped in on a Friday just after they opened and were lucky to get a table (better to have a reservation). Everything was wonderful. Great wine list, plus the best NY Strip I’ve had in a long while. Brandy was an excellent server - she was fun, friendly, and made our experience top notch. We loved Central!

name: Pope Jaiden
text: The food was excellent, perfect portions, well presented, and good choices. unique and varied options with local flare. I would say best in MGM. If you haven't been lately, you need to go! I had the short rib and it was superb, but all the others at my table were well pleased as well. You had to try the dessert; the chef was that good. Service was on point as well.

name: Arthur McIntosh
text: We walked in for date night 3 minutes late for our reservation and the hostess was lovely and extremely friendly. As we were seated we were told the name of our server and in 5 min or less she came to our table and began a wonderful experience. The food was delicious, hot, and exactly as ordered. The restaurant is beautiful inside and the drink menu is great. Absolutely wonderful date night experience, I highly recommend.

name: Christopher Warms
text: We had it all, an app, salad, entrees, and dessert. All was phenomenal! But the whole experience was completed by our extremely courteous and awesome waiter, Andre! Our outdoor dining date night, and farewell dinner before we move could not have been any better!

name: Deezy 334
text: Well I must say, first time going to this place and it was 10 ⭐. Everything was perfect from the service, food, atmosphere, even the water was good.. Must I say, best experience out of my 36 years in Montgomery.. Will go again.. Very soon.. New spot to dine in for me. Thanks Central!!!!

resp.text: No, thank you Deezy! We appreciate your kind words and support very much. We're not perfect but our staff tries very hard to provide our guest with an exceptional experience. We look forward to serving you again very soon! Best regards!

name: Usman Ibrayimov
text: We were just in town for the night and we had dinner here based on reviews. It was a really place with good food and cocktails. Outside there were few people walking so we were wondering if we made the right choice. However, once inside it was bustling and the staff welcoming. Our martini’s were perfect and the dinner didn’t disappoint. Go for dinner. You’ll be glad you did.

name: Adi Toledano
text:
Good atmosphere and service.
Amazing meat, especially the short rib.
Great desert.
Not cheap, but worth it.

name: Cornelius Nunn
text: Always a great experience here. The best New York Strip I've ever had, and the best beignet outside of New Orleans.

name: Jeffrey Olson
text: Crab fried rice is like nothing we’ve ever had. My friend actually ordered a second dish of it. We shared the crab fried rice a the beef short ribs. Fantastic dishes. We also had their specialty fries, they were over the top delicious topped with herbs, cheese and seasonings.

name: Belinda Bates
text: Was there for a seminar! The food was off the chain! Will definitely go back!

name: Richard Gayle
text: A class act. I booked online through resy.com and mentioned we would be visiting for my wife's birthday. Every staff member that passed wished her a happy birthday. Our waitress was knowledgeable and a delight to converse with. The food was fantastic, especially the crab cigar. We also enjoyed our cocktails and dessert. Thank you very much everyone!

resp.text: We are so glad you and your wife enjoyed your experience and appreciate your kind words very much! We look forward to serving you again very soon!

name: Kent Still
text: A big name in a small town. If you are downtown then Central is a must. Shout out to the bar, Miss Raven to be exact! The food is some of the best you'll find in Montgomery. They never let us down, even due to the high bar they have already set for themselves time and time again. 5 stars!

resp.text: Thanks for such a wonderful review Kent! We will be sure and let Raven know you are happy! We take nothing for granted and appreciate your support very much! Please come visit again very soon!

name: Dentake Bullse
text: The atmosphere and decor are beautiful. Salads are often hum drum but not iceberg salad with blue cheese,radishes and bacon. The lamb ribs were a knockout. For our entrees we ordered plank salmon and crab fried rice. Both were excellent. Service was professional. Everything was amazing.

resp.text: What a wonderful review! Thank you for letting us know about your experience. We appreciate your support and hope you serve you again soon!

name: felecia stinson
text: Flew into town to experience this restaurant I've heard so much about.  The food and the ambiance were great! Bethany,  the waitress was amazing too! Definitely worth going to again...

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Felecia! We're so glad you enjoyed your visit and look forward to serving you again very soon!

name: stephanie fraioli
text: Brandy with a “Y” is a fantastic server at likely the best restaurant in Montgomery. Food and service always impeccable and the staff is honestly super friendly. I haven’t had one bad thing on the menu!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words Stephanie! We appreciate your support very much and look forward to serving you again soon.

name: Kohler Senaida
text: The atmosphere and decor are beautiful. Salads are often hum drum but not iceberg salad with blue cheese, radishes and bacon. The lamb ribs were a knockout. For our entrees we ordered plank salmon and crab fried rice. Both were excellent. Service was professional. Highly recommended.

name: Kilback Mayo
text: The atmosphere and decor are beautiful. Salads are often hum drum but not iceberg salad with blue cheese,radishes and bacon. The lamb ribs were a knockout. For our entrees we ordered plank salmon and crab fried rice. Both were excellent. Service was professional. I’m not sure I’ve ever seen a more amazing atmosphere- it is the definition of industrial chic.

name: Maurice Pruna
text: great ambience and food. really good for special occasions

name: v.m. arrington
text: My friends and I had a wonderful time. The food was simply amazing and the server Haley was awesome!

resp.text: Great to hear! We're so glad you and your friends had an enjoyable experience with us. We hope you can return soon!

name: loveless green
text: Amazing experience! We came here for my birthday as we were visiting the Legacy Museum and many different historical monuments in Montgomery. High quality atmosphere, dressy casual with a high class ambiance. I’m pretty sure my waitress was Trina, real cool, funny, awesome and knowledgeable! By the way, this was my first time visiting the area and didn’t know it was still open due to Covid. Trina informed us that they had been closed for months and just recently opened back up. As a Manager myself, there’s certain things I observe with customer service and the way customers are treated. Trina was very aware at all times of our needs and didn’t fall short in catering to them. She was prompt, energetic, feisty and fun lol all while being professional! Would highly recommend to anyone looking to have a great time while visiting the area. Keep up the great work guys! Nice job Trina!

resp.text: What a wonderful review! Nothing makes us happier than our guest having a wonderful experience! Thank you for taking the time to leave us your kind words about your visit and we hope you can return again very soon!

name: David Neumeyer
text: We greatly enjoyed the oyster slider and ahi tuna appetizers, the Sunday Sauce short ribs and Gulf catch, the amazing beignet, excellent drinks, attentive service, and good prices.

name: Suso González Souto
text: Central is a good restaurant. The food was good although it lacked some originality. Great grits, the duck was tasty although it arrived a bit cold... in general it didn't disappoint but it wasn't anything special either. The wine list was overwhelmingly California which is a bummer.

name: Dalphne Wilson
text: I have never dined at a Michelin Star Restaurant but if I had to imagine what the experience is like, Central Restaurant in downtown Montgomery checks all of the boxes!  An exquisite, first rate dining experience is to be had by all who enters!

name: Gianna L
text: Excellent place for American food. Really nothing but great experiences here, so I will be back. This place has an awesome feel to it. Food and atmosphere reminds me of Atlanta.

name: Maurice Pruna
text: great ambience and food. really good for special occasions

name: David Neumeyer
text: We greatly enjoyed the oyster slider and ahi tuna appetizers, the Sunday Sauce short ribs and Gulf catch, the amazing beignet, excellent drinks, attentive service, and good prices.

name: William Johnson
text:
This place was simply delicious, for all of the senses.  Atmosphere is great,  very well appointed,  simple and clean.  Service,  impeccable.  Even with a brand new menu (1st night of service) our server was knowledgeable and helpful in narrowing down our desire to order everything on the menu.  Food was excellent.  Extremely well prepared and presentation very nice.   I wish I had found this place my first night in town,  not only to have seen and tried the previous menu,  but to save myself the hassle of some rather mediocre meals from other nearby establishments.  If you are looking for a great meal in Montgomery Alabama,  this place should be at the very top of your list.
Oh, and the cocktails are impeccable,  again,  delicious and extremely difficult to choose.

name: loveless green
text: Amazing experience! We came here for my birthday as we were visiting the Legacy Museum and many different historical monuments in Montgomery. High quality atmosphere, dressy casual with a high class ambiance. I’m pretty sure my waitress was Trina, real cool, funny, awesome and knowledgeable! By the way, this was my first time visiting the area and didn’t know it was still open due to Covid. Trina informed us that they had been closed for months and just recently opened back up. As a Manager myself, there’s certain things I observe with customer service and the way customers are treated. Trina was very aware at all times of our needs and didn’t fall short in catering to them. She was prompt, energetic, feisty and fun lol all while being professional! Would highly recommend to anyone looking to have a great time while visiting the area. Keep up the great work guys! Nice job Trina!

resp.text: What a wonderful review! Nothing makes us happier than our guest having a wonderful experience! Thank you for taking the time to leave us your kind words about your visit and we hope you can return again very soon!

name: Tamara Y. Washington
text:
We were visiting the Legacy Museum (two doors down) and were starving like no one's business and "ran upon" Central. We caught it right before they were closing for lunch. I honestly thought they wouldn't seat us so close to closing, but they did. STAR!

The ambiance is dark wood, open kitchen, and high ceilings. It smells amazing in there.

We chose a few appetizers because everything sounded so good, we couldn't decide. The fried tomatoes, okra & pimento cheese dish, and cheddar cheese grits (it's a side but were ordered it as an appetizer0 were amazing.

I started with a cup of heirloom tomato bisque. Had the right amount of seasoning and not too much cream. Perfect. I had the fish & grits as my entree. UH-MAZ-ING.

Nothing was over-seasoned and were the perfect temperature.

The vanilla creme brulee was a perfect ending to this lunch. I now want to back to Montgomery and visit to have dinner there!

name: Dalphne Wilson
text: I have never dined at a Michelin Star Restaurant but if I had to imagine what the experience is like, Central Restaurant in downtown Montgomery checks all of the boxes!  An exquisite, first rate dining experience is to be had by all who enters!

name: Suso González Souto
text: Central is a good restaurant. The food was good although it lacked some originality. Great grits, the duck was tasty although it arrived a bit cold... in general it didn't disappoint but it wasn't anything special either. The wine list was overwhelmingly California which is a bummer.

name: Jared Ray
text: Truly blown away by the amazing dishes and service. The ambiance and building are beautiful. I couldn’t recommend enough!

name: Sapphire Washington
text: Every single thing we ordered was beyond amazing 💚💚 Brandy took care of us and she was extremely friendly and very knowledgeable of the menu. The desserts are heavenly also.

name: B S
text: the food here is amazing I got the flat bread and local vegetables and they were so delicious! The waitress was very helpful with what was on the menu, she was also very kind and quick to bring out the food. I highly recommend this place to anyone the food here is good and it's not an expensive price either! We had a party of 7 and we still got served very quickly, it's really nice to be able to see the kitchen to from where you're sitting

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Brittany! We like nothing more than for our guest to have a wonderful experience. We look forward to serving you again soon!

name: Eric Watson
text: They have patio so feel free to dine outside if the weather is nice. The also serve locally roasted coffee, which is always a plus. I am so happy that I live so close to this place because it is become a must stop in KC.

name: Danilo Nufio
text: The food was great and the service was superb! Would definitely recommend. The manager and the waiters were kind and accommodating to our needs.

name: Danelia SC
text: Nice and calm place.Very nice atmosphere for date

name: DeCorey Hale
text: Such an enjoyable experience every time. From management to staff, everything was top notch. Highly recommend.

name: Billy McLeod
text: To start with there was a lot of pimento cheese which is always a good thing.  The fried okra appetizer was amazing. Also the Burger was off the charts. Both dishes had pimento cheese included. We also enjoyed the arugula salad with the strawberry, candied pecans and a great poppy seed dressing. All the vegetables were fresh and great.

name: Christy Wadsworth
text: Had our Valentine’s meal there and it was incredible. I honestly wasn’t expecting to write a great review because we’ve gone to Central in the past and it was more of a 3 or 4 star experience but they have elevated their game. Our waiter, Andre, was fabulous. The filet with foie gras was one of the best steaks I’ve ever eaten anywhere. Glad to be able to tell everyone that Central was a great experience.

resp.text: We truly appreciate your kind words and are so glad you had an enjoyable experience! We hope to serve you again very soon!

name: Alain B
text: Make sure to drop by and enjoy the food and atmosphere when you're in town

name: Stacia Franks
text: Had the Sunday Sauce with a side of grits; both were okay.  I really liked the atmosphere & every member of the staff I interacted with was customer focused.

name: Brad Gauvin
text: This is an excellent spot for a date or food tasting! Their staff was amazing and surprisingly knowledgeable of their food and very helpful. The food was well worth the price, though it is expensive. Every detail of a dish is thought of. Their Creme brûlée was a highlight for me but those I was dining with raves about the lemon meringue. We were told that their menu was in constant flux. I would be very excited to try this place a gain. It was a little loud for dinner. So, please don’t expect a very intimate setting, even though the ambiance suggests that it would be perfect for a date. Still a great spot especially if you’re a “foodie”.

name: Łukasz Piątek
text: Very good and tasty food, good service, rather high prices

name: Scott McKeever
text: Absolutely fantastic. Service was awesome! food was awesome!

resp.text: Wow, thank you Scott! We hope to see you again very soon!

name: István Cseh jr.
text: Eating here is like listening to good old soul music. I got a nice table, the waitress (Whitney) was perfect. She knows the menucard well and can tell you what fits well together - so I started with an amazing foie gras (I'm Hungarian and we just love it) - then I had the salmon (well done over the brickoven) and so I finished with the creme brûlée. Can you feel it? The Soul? Eating here is like a solid marriage - take your time and you feel like in heaven.

name: Miguel Villanueva
text: An great wine and food restaurant. Understand it's a classy place so the prices may seem high but the ambience is superb. The pork chop was a little dry but tasted ok. My friend ordered her steak med well and it came med rare. They comped her meal. My steak was delicious. The service was great.  The wines were great as well.

name: Lisle and Jessica Babcock
text: Great good, fun atmosphere, friendly and knowledgeable staff.  Brandy was our waitress, and provided outstanding service.

name: Tim Hammond
text: You have got to try their flatbreads at lunch. They regularly sell out. Best pizza I've ever had. Burgers have a unique tomato jam that is unlike anything you've had. The patty melt below is amazing.

name: Mike Jones
text:
The food at Central just leaves a taste in your mouth that makes you want to keep coming back for more. We will truly miss this place when we move to Florida in June.

16 oz. NY Strip, Pommes aligot, white asparagus, oyster mushrooms, sauce au poivere

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We appreciate them very much! Hopefully you can come back and visit us soon.

name: Alex Thomas
text: Must try in Montgomery - we had a great time at Central. Lunch service was very attentive - the decor is incredible. We tried the salmon spinach salad which was prepared perfectly, the steakhouse wedge and the fried chicken blt. All of us were very impressed. Restaurant also features vegetarian and gluten free options. Would absolutely recommend.

name: Cindy Lopez
text: Everything we had was delicious and amazing! The staff was so friendly and kind. I highly recommend the brussel sprouts, the duck, and the Pi cocktail! Nenlay was our waiter, and they were wonderful!

name: marcus veazey
text: Can't say anything bad about this place. The ambiance is incredible. The service was wonderful and the food was to die for. Everything was seasoned and cooked to perfection and each dish was presented exquisitely. 5 stars

name: Insang Song
text: Montgomery has a few places that have really good food for those that come from other areas. Specifically for me I'm from San Francisco so not having a variety of food in Montgomery is really a disappointment. Whenever I feel the need for good food I go to Central. You can pretty much get your craving filled here. Don't miss out! They have great selection of beer and wine.

name: LaTia Scott
text: I visited on Saturday even about 6. I was in a fairly large group of about 15. The ambiance was very nice, I liked the fact the bar was further into the restaurant and not as soon as you walked in. The wait staff was really nice and accommodating. I felt the menu was a bit pricey and limited too, as a pescaterian I had like two entree options. The cocktails sound very carefully crafted and fun, many in my party ordered them and seemed very satisfied. I had a lot of food here and nothing really blew me away. My entree red grouper was bland for sure. I also had the pimento cheese, which also fell short of my expectations. I think the highlight of my meal was dessert, I had the sweet potato cheesecake and it was really good. I don't know that if I were in Montgomery again that I would return, nothing too memorable about this place.

name: Bryan Carter
text: Central has a special place among restaurants in Montgomery - it manages to serve tasteful food with a beautiful atmosphere and professional staff — every time! I attribute their success to General Manager David Forbes. Take the opportunity to visit Central today.

name: Richie Newberry
text: Amazing food. The fett sow fries are insanely good. Filet was also cooked very well. Highly recommend

name: Hanh Dillon
text: We got right into it with three Sunday Sauce / Bolognese and one short ribs with polenta. Oh and a side of Brussel sprouts with bacon and honey. Holy cow, the flavors! We crushed all the food. Must have looked like we just ran a marathon and we're refueling... except. I'd go out of my way to return.

name: Eddie Edwards
text: This was my first time here. This place looked very nice on the inside. It had a good ambience. The vibe here makes you feel very relaxed. The food came out very quickly. Everything tastes great. Our server was very nice and had very good customer service. This is a place we must go back to again.

name: William Kamari
text: We got right into it with three Sunday Sauce / Bolognese and one short ribs with polenta. Oh and a side of Brussel sprouts with bacon and honey. Holy cow, the flavors! We crushed all the food. Must have looked like we just ran a marathon and we're refueling... except. I one would accuse my group of running :'-)

name: Kami Scarborough
text: We had our work Christmas dinner at Central and it did not disappoint! Delicious food, options for everyone, and great service. We will be back!

name: Stephanie Diaz
text: Staff friendly, clean, slower than I'd like but good

name: Matthew Voke
text:
Great food prep and presentation. Good, but not great taste. The steaks aren’t what we were expecting for the price and quality of the sides and service. The fries and brussel sprouts were great, the two steaks we had were good. The drinks were very good.

Bring someone in to take your beef to the next level or change your supplier.

name: Robbert Fairbrother
text: It's hard to hit the right tone, but if this is hte best restaurant in town, the restaurant scene in Montgomery needs serious upgrading. Don't get me wrong. Some of the dishes were excellent. The Sow Fett Fries -- unctuous french fry shape pork belly -- were superb. The short ribs were nothing short of heaven. The pimento cheese, well, if you can't pull off pimento cheese in this part of the world, close up shop. They don't have to.

name: Darius Rollins
text: american food and the setting at this location is excellent. I was super full. This place has many reviews for a reason.

name: Wilson Christa
text: Southern Chicken Fried Lamb was AMAZING. Pimento cheese was delicious as was the pork belly.  My husband's steak was bland however.  But they finished string with coffee creme brule

name: Robert Jackson
text: A conference I attended hosted a mean in the downstairs area. The food was great and the atmosphere nice.

name: Craig Kenady
text: I've enjoyed multiple meals and celebrations at this place and have never had a less than amazing time.

name: Will May
text: Very good food and friendly staff. Bring a ATM to pay for your food. It is worth it to me.

name: Sapphire Washington
text: Every single thing we ordered was beyond amazing 💚💚 Brandy took care of us and she was extremely friendly and very knowledgeable of the menu. The desserts are heavenly also.

name: Joe Mcclendon
text: Awesome food and service. It was refreshing change the food was outstanding

name: STF Events & Catering
text: Pleasantly surprised by this gem in Montgomery! Visited the city to experience the Legacy Museum. After such a heavy, emotional experience, we wanted dinner to be easy, yet delicious. An employee at the museum recommended Central and since it was in walking distance from our hotel, we gave it a shot. Wow! It was outstanding! Staff wore masks and guests are required to wear them to enter, which was a must for us. They also had an outdoor dining area which made it perfect. Our server, Trina, was fun, knowledgeable and took great care of us. Cocktails were well done and priced well. We had chargrilled oysters for a starter. And they were served with homemade crackers! For entrees, we had the duck and beef short ribs. Both were really good, but the 5 onion and parmesan grits with the short ribs really made that dish a stand out. The sweet potato oreo cheesecake and apple-bacon fritters were the perfect finish. Would highly recommend Central!

name: Hannah Bobo
text: Food, drinks, atmosphere, and wait staff are always great here.

name: Kelley Jacobs
text: The food was absolutely amazing and the staff was incredible. Well worth a visit!!

name: B S
text: the food here is amazing I got the flat bread and local vegetables and they were so delicious! The waitress was very helpful with what was on the menu, she was also very kind and quick to bring out the food. I highly recommend this place to anyone the food here is good and it's not an expensive price either! We had a party of 7 and we still got served very quickly, it's really nice to be able to see the kitchen to from where you're sitting

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Brittany! We like nothing more than for our guest to have a wonderful experience. We look forward to serving you again soon!

name: Christopher Coleman
text:
Absolutely phenomenal customer service and food !
Definitely will be back ! Me and the wife had a splendid time ! The lamb ribs and beef short ribs were amazing ! Shout to the chef Jason and his wife for a delicious dessert as well cream brûlée !

name: Jared Ray
text: Truly blown away by the amazing dishes and service. The ambiance and building are beautiful. I couldn’t recommend enough!

name: Hal Murphy
text: We enjoy Central each year during a state conference.  It's always great.  However, tonight was exceptional!  From the staff squeezing in our party of 7 to the moment we walked out the door, this was our BEST Central experience yet.  This is in large part due to the great server we had.  Rich was helpful, attentive - about the best server we could ever have.  The food was amazing.  The deserts.... wow.  Thank you, Central, and thank YOU, Rich for a great end to the week for all of us.  We look forward to seeing you next year!

name: Lilly Gibbs
text: Fried Chicken Skins! - at first I thought this would be gross but OMG it was delicious! the batter was simply mouth watering! Cheese and Charcuterie Board - great meats and cheeses (made in house, I think?) the sauces they had on the side was the perfect balance of sweet to go with the cheese.

name: Judy
text: The cuisine and service are always on point. Love Central!!

name: Stephania Exantus-Vereen
text: The duck was amazing. I opted to have it without the chocolate sauce, as I do not eat chocolate. Still great!

name: Lynn Chancey wadsworth
text: Our server Andrea (sorry if i spelled name wrong) he  was very knowledgeable about the  menu and took pride in his job. Food was very good as always.

name: Jason Miller
text: Great Atmosphere and tasty food!

resp.text: Thanks Jason! Please come back soon!

name: Fernando Nufio
text: The food, the place and the staff are all 5 stars!!

name: Clay Stewart
text: Had two business dinners at Central and not only was the food outstanding but Haley and the staff were outstanding!! They provided personal service to our groups and made our dining experience a pleasure.  I was impressed with the entire meal.  I would highly recommend Central for dinner!! Thank you

name: Craig Minoff
text: Sunday sauce was one of the best dishes of all time

resp.text: Thank you Craig! We appreciate your kind words and support. We hope you dine with us again very soon!

name: Brandi
text: We decided to do dinner here tonight after our courthouse marriage. They were so great and accommodating for us to have a nice private booth and we received many congratulations from several of the staff.  The food was BEYOND our expectations.  The Sow Fries were amazing. The smoked beef short rib with the Brussels sprouts, risotto, and pumpkin puree was so delicious and perfectly cooked.  It was a huge plate and we both ate some and brought some home.  My husband had the Sunday sauce and he said it was great.  The service was friendly and fast (shout out to our waitress Nora!)  the food came out quickly,  and the drinks were perfectly crafted.  I can't say enough about this place! My only regret is that I didn't take a photo of the food to share with my review!

name: Brittany Hathcote
text: SOOOOO yummy!! The service and staff were so friendly!! The food was absolutely phenomenal!! I am really excited to go back! It made for a fantastic date night/birthday dinner. I would recommend this place to anyone. I will say, it is fine dining, so it is on the more expensive side, but totally worth it for the experience!

name: Ewan Moran
text: delicious food and tasty food. staff was very nice.

name: Maria Washington
text: From the moment we walked in the door we were overwhelmed with kindness and incredible customer service. Our waiter, Nigel, was so great and we all loved him. I've been in Montgomery for 3 days for a trip and not once have I encountered such incredibly kind and accommodating people. The food and drinks were also amazing. If you're ever in the area, definitely give this place a try.

name: Lam Bregh
text: This place is great. I haven’t been in Montgomery for a spell after living here for years. Wish this kind of place was here before. Great food, great location, generally cool looking building. No complaints.

name: Tamara Y. Washington
text:
We were visiting the Legacy Museum (two doors down) and were starving like no one's business and "ran upon" Central. We caught it right before they were closing for lunch. I honestly thought they wouldn't seat us so close to closing, but they did. STAR!

The ambiance is dark wood, open kitchen, and high ceilings. It smells amazing in there.

We chose a few appetizers because everything sounded so good, we couldn't decide. The fried tomatoes, okra & pimento cheese dish, and cheddar cheese grits (it's a side but were ordered it as an appetizer0 were amazing.

I started with a cup of heirloom tomato bisque. Had the right amount of seasoning and not too much cream. Perfect. I had the fish & grits as my entree. UH-MAZ-ING.

Nothing was over-seasoned and were the perfect temperature.

The vanilla creme brulee was a perfect ending to this lunch. I now want to back to Montgomery and visit to have dinner there!

name: Kaitlyn Tylar
text: Amazing cocktails in a laid back and beautiful atmosphere with charismatic staff. This place is a gem.

resp.text: Thank you Kaitlyn! We truly appreciate the kind words. We hope to serve you again soon.

name: Julie Dickey
text:
March 13, 2020
Friday before Coronavirus Pandemic changed all restaurants from inside dining. My family took me here for lunch on my birthday.
PROS;Our waiter was awesome & so was the food. The atmosphere is wonderful, place is inviting & staff are friendly & helpful.  Its absolutely beautiful inside with the exposed ceiling, open kitchen & decor. Great place for a romantic dinner or special occasion event. I got the chicken sandwich with fries & it was yummy. If you're not a picky eater & willing to try anything its definitely the place for you. The desserts are delicious & appealing to the eye. Plenty of room for large groups or parties.
CONS: Not good for kids with the cost of food & limited selection on menu that has unique meals. Its what I'd call fancy food. Not your basic hamburger/sandwich, steak & potato meals like most restaurants in town. Parking isn't great.  I think the handicapp parking is across the street & the other is timed metered parking. If the weather is bad you'll need to plan on dressing appropriately due to distance from parking to entrance.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words Julie! We're glad you enjoyed your meal while celebrating your birthday with us! For future reference we do have one handicap space in front of our restaurant and we also offer complimentary valet parking during dinner service if you dine with us at that time. Thanks again and we hope we get to serve you again soon. Stay safe.

name: Vedran Vanmelis
text: "Enjoyed the great service and variety of food offered at this restaurant."

name: Austin Russell
text: Is always great.

name: Jonathan suthard
text: Amazing food and customer service!!!

name: Eric D.
text: Exquisite food, great atmosphere.

name: Agness Rudo M
text: Beautiful setting great service

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words! We hope to see you again very soon!

name: Mike Patterson
text: hated the short rib, but everything else was wonderful, especially our server!

resp.text: Well that's not what we like to hear Mike! So sorry that you didn't enjoy your meal. We try very hard to provide everyone with an exceptional experience and when that's not the case we take it very seriously. Please always remember to let our staff know when your experience is not up to your expectations so that we can do whatever we can to address the issues while your dining with us. Feel free to reach out to our General Manager and discuss your experience. Thank you.

name: John Johnson
text: This place is great. I haven’t been in Montgomery for a spell after living here for years. Wish this kind of place was here before. Great food, great location, generally cool looking building. No complaints.

name: Adena Dannouf
text: I had an amazing experience here. As vegetarians, my husband ordered the lunch combo with an avocado roll and sweet potato roll. I ordered the tempura veggie box lunch not knowing it came with a California roll and a spring roll. After asking if the spring roll had meat, the waitress appeared with a 6 piece avocado roll to replace the 4 piece California and spring roll I was unable to eat. Food was FANYASTIC and portions were ample. Would DEFINITELY come again!!

name: Meghan Moss
text: Really good food!

name: Nicolas Sharpe
text: Very nice atmosphere, friendly wait staff, everything tastes great. Since I work in a restaurant I know price inflation and for the produce and meat to be local bought the menu is overpriced even for fine dining. But that's what makes it fine dining, the price you're willing to pay for something you've never had.

name: Michaela Mentasti
text: Nice atmosphere, nice menu and broad selection. Fish spread as an appetizer needed a bit more salt. Rib and risotto were okay, but too sweet for my liking,  the meat was good. Too expensive for the quality of the food served.

name: Seth Miller
text: Serious food for serious foodies, and equally important, they nailed the service aspect.  Great job Jason and the whole team at Central!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the kind words. We will let the entire Central team know! Look forward to serving you again soon.

name: Rich Schuster
text:
Food and service were awesome, and we really enjoyed the atmosphere. They use some great flavor combinations that make each dish unique. As an example- we had their bread pudding for dessert- a cupcake sized bread pudding base, surrounded by an apple and cinnamon chutney, topped with a scoop of salted caramel ice cream... Perfect.
A bit pricey- but seemed worth it

name: Zach Sigda
text: Jonathan was a great server, kept checking on us regularly, was very friendly and personable, and made great recommendations! The fold was excellent, charcuterie board and the chefs donuts were my favorites. Really cool venue. Would definitely recommend

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words Zach. We're so glad you had a good experience and appreciate you taking the time to leave us such a great review. We look forward to your next visit!

name: Jutta Chambers
text: There were six of us for lunch we had a varitof items the catfish was wonderful and so was the tomato soup and grilled cheese. Also the beers and cocktails hit the spot. Would definitely come back.

resp.text: Thanks Jutta! We're all about our patrons having a wonderful experience and are so glad you took the time to let us know about yours. We look forward to serving you again soon!

name: April Daniels
text: I had a reservation tonight (2/13) at 6:30pm for my husband and me. I arrived and was pointed to a small 2 chair table that was placed directly in front of the entrance.  Who wants to sit in front of the entrance door and very close to the hostess desk?  There were other empty tables but I wonder why I couldn’t sit at those tables.  Something to ponder.

name: Kristi Pruitt
text: I had dinner with a friend there on a weeknight while we were at a conference in Montgomery. We loved everything about the experience, the menu, the food and drink, and especially the service. Our server Raven seemed truly excited that my friend and I were there and happy to guide us through the menu. She did something no other server has ever done for me, offered to show us photos of the food on her cell phone. For a visual person like me, this was a great idea. When my friend asked for a glass of red wine to accompany the entree Raven asked her preferences and brought her 2 selections to choose from.

name: Amanda Cook
text: Lunch was great! I think the new Chef is doing an excellent job.

name: Shari Beck
text:
Great tasty chicken!
Even in rush hours they were fast!
Will be back.
However I think they should add more kale to their "kale" salad.

name: Jordan Moorer
text: Central is the bomb. Gabby sold us the last short rib and recommended the chef’s donuts, which were EXCELLENT! Great atmosphere, excellent food, and Gabby was great—and those lashes, tho... #distraction

name: Georgia Sharpe
text: Great place to visit quiet atmosphere.great FAMILY great food try it out!!!!!!

name: Josh Prevatt
text: Absolutely exquisite! Great atmosphere & even better food. The staff was second to none! Might become my new favorite restaurant

name: Matt M
text: Exquisite dining, with personable staff and chefs who care about quality and taste.  Every bite had delectable flavor.  The location is well lit by both table light candles and wall mounted candles.

name: Amy Brown, Residential Alabama
text: The food and atmosphere at Central were fabulous. Absolutely enjoyed my birthday dinner there! My 16 oz ribeye was one of the best I’ve ever had.

resp.text: Amy we are so glad you had a wonderful dinner and celebrated your special birthday with us! We hope we have the opportunity to serve you again soon.

name: Betsy Levitas
text: This is a restaurant that cares deeply about you and the food they serve. Once we found this farm to table restaurant, with service to match the excellent, innovative menu, we went nowhere else.  Every dish was beautifully conceived and executed. And the cocktail and wine program perfectly complemented the menu. But the real star in the mix might be the incredibly attuned and skillful servers/bartenders who guide you to your perfect experience.

name: Fernando Fragoso
text:
Excellent service and the food was amazing!!! I will certainly be back.
Parking was a little bit of a hassle but they have valet as well...

name: Chris Golden
text: Quality over quantity--that's what you get when you dine at Central.  If you're looking for a seasonal menu offering local ingredients then this is your place.  I've dined here a number of times and found that I prefer the dinner menu over the lunch menu (like other reviews have noted, the fries are overly oily).  With that said, everything is prepared to order.

name: Felicia Edwards
text: The absolute best place to eat in Montgomery.  Ask for Richard. Also we have sat with Valerie and Nigel, they are amazing too!! If you like Oysters, make sure you try the appetizer, you won't regret it!!

name: R. Smith
text: Great food. I had 16oz ribeye and wife had a pasta dish that was very interesting. Server lacked any real warmth or friendliness though

name: Clayton Newkirk
text: Visiting the area for a few days and stopped in for dinner,  this is a great place. A farm to table so the menu is a little limited but delicious.  Our group ate a variety of dishes and everyone left happy. This is a must if you are in Montgomery.

name: Judah Sixsmith
text: I would come back to get the crab legs and just to tip the chef for his/her work. I swear this is the best restaurant in San Antonio, FOR YEARS. It is consistent and always delivers something new that NEVER disappoints. The food is superb, the staff is professional and efficient, always making excellent recommendations. But really, I think anything that makes its way to the table is never short of magnificent. The wine menu is preferentially the best in the city. It has some favorite players and some guest appearances that introduce me to new loves

name: Edwin-Yvette Gillam
text: Beautiful location, Delicious food. Clean restroom! We came to the area for the weekend, and selected Centrals based on the reviews. We made reservations for dinner, * special occasion*, our waitress was pleasant however she added an entree to our order that we did not request, an appeared surprised when we asked, “who was the plate for”?  It’s always important to confirm an order before placing it, to ensure accuracy. We look forward to visiting the location again.

name: Jennifer Minto
text: Great winter squash bisque and steakhouse wedge salad. Casual but upscale. A definite repeat.

name: Isaac Ralston
text: Food was insanely good and we had the best waitress. Such an enjoyable experience. Will definitely be back next time I'm in Montgomery.

name: Brie M
text: This is one of the better, if not the best place to eat in Montgomery. The atmosphere is exciting and the place was charming. The staff is very friendly and the food was excellent.

name: Patti Campbell
text: We had a beautiful dinner. The pimento cheese appetizer was wonderful.  Our server Tanner was friendly and courteous.  Drinks were very good, and the wedge salad and the  scallops were awesome. Beautiful atmosphere!

name: Ken Taylor
text: Fantastic food, great atmosphere and excellent service. A must in Montgomery! Recommend this place without hesitation. Only problem is the noise.

name: Jeffrey Lugo
text: Good food, good service. Tip is included on the bill. Its located in downtown Montgomery so have some spare change to pay for parking.

name: Kelle Pressley
text: Beautiful and yummy local food. Super easy to find!!!! Which is a plus while walking. We had a large group and as a measure of service, let me just add that our glasses stayed full and we left our waitress smiling. We used thier group space upstairs and was able to conduct business and have a great time stimutaniously . Grab a biscuit, chicken breast, and bread pudding then smile!

name: Senior Living Guide
text: First. Yes gotta tried the okra appetizer. Its great and I dont even eat okra. The sales seem to be the way to go for lunch.  I'd call this gourmet southern food.

name: Stephen Peters
text: The food was amazing. Gabrielle provided excellent service. 5 freaking stars!

name: David Barnes
text: Awesome atmosphere, excellent service, beautiful building and business, highly recommended. Prices what you would expect for a high end restaurant. Definitely worth the money if looking to impress someone.

name: Rachael S.
text: Food was creative and very good. Our server Gabi was fun and very attentive! Highly recommend for a fiber dining experience.

name: Shawn Vincent
text: Everything here was better than I expected, and the desserts were spectacular. We definitely got the best out of Montgomery, and Valerie gave us a terrific experience.

name: Mika Korvyakov
text: Was a very upscale restaurant. The food was delicately prepared and finely served. Staff looked and acted very professional. The food quality was magnificent, as that of the wine. The perfect place to hold a meeting, or a friend gathering.

name: Brandy Morton
text: We went for my birthday. We had the fet show fries, charcuterie board, steaks, and bread pudding for dessert! Food and service were both amazing! Will definitely be back!

name: timothy stice
text: Unique food combinations layers of flavor. Super great staff and a nice atmosphere. You get what you pay for.

name: William Van Hooser
text: The night was perfect.  The meal and the soft shell crab was also perfect.  Our waitress did her job extremely well and did not disappoint.  Appetizers, entre's, wine, etc great.    For Three people $311.00 bill with a good tip.  All great.  Then one party ordered a cup of decaf coffee for us and they brought an additional $8.00 bill to be paid separate.  I said there must be a mistake, surely you are not going to bill another bill for 3 cups of decaf after we paid $311.00 for dinner?  Manager said, "Sir, we run a business...."    I said, fine, I will pay the additional amount for the coffee...but it ruined our meal.  Some things just don't taste right.  After all a 20% tip of about $60.00 should have covered 3 cups of decaf.??

name: Katherine Chastain
text: Fantastic experience! Melody was amazing! She gave wonderful recommendations and made sure our experience was excellent. There are few places that truly care about their patrons and it was clear the Central staff cared about every person having a great evening! I would highly recommend it for a great night out!

name: Tristan Wright
text: The atmosphere was great!! Food and service were awesome!!

name: Joel Behnke
text: Delicious elegant food! The service was outstanding and it never felt like they were protruding. Would definitely come back!

name: Ted Stiefel
text: What a great experience. We came just for appetizers and were very happy how they turned out!  Had the sow fries and the mussels with sausage and fries. Wow! Such flavor!  The waitress gave great service and recommendations.

name: Jessica Pearson
text: Great place for a date night. great food !!!

name: Bull
text: I have been twice before and had an excellent experience both times but the third time was a disappointment. I'm sure it would have been a great third time if the hostess didn't ruin the evening within seconds of entering the establishment. Will be giving this place a while to hopefully improve before returning again.

name: Art Hogarth
text: What an awesome place that is elevated above anything else nearbye.  The service from the Hostess to the Bartender was great.  I ordered the Veal Chop (Cooked perfectly) and it wonderdfully paired with fire roasted parsnips and a mix of mushrooms all with a lite drizzel of an earthy gravy. Also had a tomoate mixture served cold on top.   My only complaint was I couldn't pick up the bone and gnaw on it to get every bit off.  The open kitchen was great and it was an experience to watch the kitchen work behind the leader of the chef.   Dont miss this place, it's so worth a visit!!!

name: Joyce Hudson
text: Ordered the slow cooked short ribs as take out...when I opened container at home there was a large chunk of beef (not as tender as I expected) over rice and veggies...disappointed that beef was more roast beef than short rib...please change menu to reflect what's available

name: William Somar
text: Nice atmosphere and service, but the lunch menu wasn't anything spectacular. The hamburger pattie seemed school-cafeteria quality. I will try going back for dinner to see if it is any better.

name: Trudy Johnson
text: Great service and delicious food. We really enjoyed the atmosphere and our experience at Central.

name: Laura Araiza
text: It was amazing. The food was delicious, the staff was friendly. I couldn't have asked for a better dinner.

name: Matthew McMullin
text: First class dining in Montgomery!

name: Cody Cowan
text: Food was great! My wife and I went there for the first time on today on our 3 year anniversary and we couldn’t have asked for a better experience. I reserved a table online the day prior and they called me the day of to confirm our reservation and asked if it was for an occasion or if we had any food allergies. I informed them that it was our anniversary and we had no food allergies. When we got there they had a table ready immediately and they even had special menus that said “Happy Anniversary” on them. Gabi was our waitress and she was excellent. She asked if we had been there before and upon learning it was out first visit, she explained the menu to us and told us about the most popular items. I had the hanger steak and my wife had the scallops. The food was delicious and we can’t wait for our next visit here.

name: Paul Simmons
text: I had their burger, great! That burger ranks among the best I've had. The fries were exceptional also.

name: Alex Smith
text: Great food with filling portion sizes. We've been twice and have loved everything, especially the short rib, pimento cheese, and lobster corn dogs. Individual service has always been great too, but overall the staff seemed like they were barely hanging on. Staff appears to struggle to keep up with the crowd, starting at the host desk. Waited late for our reservation only to pass half a dozen open tables. Don't know why.

name: D Norris
text: Drinks are excellent. Menu changes seasonally, so what is offered can be great... Or meh. The charcuterie board is excellent and the atmosphere and waiters are wonderful. You will pay a premium and enjoy a good experience, as for taste depends on the dish and your own tastes. Great place to take out a girl and have time to talk and enjoy the night.

name: Greg Stock
text: This place was quite a surprise for my one night in town on business.  The filet mignon was truly one of the best I've ever had, and the server was a delight as well.

name: erk marx
text: Brandi was awesome and took great care of our party! She was really personable and friendly, and very knowledgeable about the menu. The food and drinks were amazing. We all really enjoyed everything we had. My favorites were the Drunken Matcha drink and the Creme Brulee.

name: Dan Allen
text: Visited this week having not been since October 18. Sadly the food just wasn't the same as what we had had the last time we came. I'm wondering if they've changed chef or decided to trade small quality food for large quantity. Waitress and staff were lovely. Hopefully they'll return to form for our next trip!

name: Chris Tarantino
text: Great staff and food.

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words! We look forward to your next visit.

name: Alesaga Mcarthur
text: Best restaurant in Montgomery.

name: john cochran
text: Great food, great service .  Loved the shrimp and grits.

name: Keith Peterson
text: Excellent food, great atmosphere with a lot of character and super friendly and helpful staff. The bill does add up though...

name: Teddy Yanez
text: We had reservations - which I think is needed for a weekend evening - but we were one of the first so we were able to ask to be seated near the window which had a nice view into the street scene. Our server was much more than just friendly - she seemed truly interested in who we were and creating connections. We started with the spicy pimento cheese spread on crispy flat bread. It was great! Then We each four different main entrees which were all excellent with perfectly cooked meats - short ribs, quails, steak. Each entree had squash and grilled Brussels sprouts plus other good vegetables. The wine was excellent. A great way to end our day in Montgomery!

name: Michael Matz
text: Great food and even better service.  The surf and turf was amazing, yet not traditional.  Scallops and pork belly together were made to he together.  Our server was fantastic even though we had a large party (10)

name: James McNees
text: Over priced for what you get.

name: Eddie Barlow Jr
text: A great romantic reservation spot for a night on the town. Seasonal menus keep the spot fresh with new ideas. Very intimate. The wife and I visit at least once a month.

name: Andrew Taweel
text: The ambiance, food quality and preparation were excellent, but the biggest treat was our server Raven!  We're definitely coming back to see her... and for that creme brulee!

name: Brad Lee
text: Went on a Thursday when they opened and were seated promptly. Our server was nice and offered suggestions. My wife had blackened Redfish and I ordered Hanger Steak. Both dishes were delicious. We tried a slice of The Alabama Classic Lane Cake and it is a wonderful dessert ending to a great culinary experience.

name: Stern Kyngdon
text: We had reservations - which I think is needed for a weekend evening - but we were one of the first so we were able to ask to be seated near the window which had a nice view into the street scene. Our server was much more than just friendly - she seemed truly interested in who we were and creating connections. We started with the spicy pimento cheese spread on crispy flat bread. It was great! Then We each four different main entrees which were all excellent with perfectly cooked meats - short ribs, quails, steak. Each entree had squash and grilled Brussels sprouts plus other good vegetables. The wine was excellent. A great way to end our day in Montgomery!

name: Johnny Barnes
text: Great drinks and food. Pricy. $80 for salad, pasta, and two drinks. All were outstanding

name: Julie H
text:
It gets some points for location and decor but the food just doesn’t quite succeed. The fried green tomatoes were good enough but the melted cheese made it heavy. The fish tacos were tasty enough but the black beans on the side were served cold. The cake was stale and the icing was crystallized and we sent it back.
Our waitress was apologetic. The chef needs to rethink his preparation.

name: Stern Kyngdon
text: We had reservations - which I think is needed for a weekend evening - but we were one of the first so we were able to ask to be seated near the window which had a nice view into the street scene. Our server was much more than just friendly - she seemed truly interested in who we were and creating connections. We started with the spicy pimento cheese spread on crispy flat bread. It was great! Then We each four different main entrees which were all excellent with perfectly cooked meats - short ribs, quails, steak. Each entree had squash and grilled Brussels sprouts plus other good vegetables. The wine was excellent. A great way to end our day in Montgomery!

name: Matt Hanson
text: Great food, but the staff wasn’t ready for our group of 12. The silverware was dirty and the waiter went on-and-on about how we shouldn’t have been booked.  It was a little awkward.

name: Stephen Marlette
text: Pretty much the best restaurant in downtown Montgomery. Our servers were outstanding.  Very friendly, very engaging and fun.  The food is a pleasant surprise. Great wood-burning oven. Try this place, you won't be disappointed.

name: James McNees
text: Over priced for what you get.

name: Gary R
text: The fact that the menu gave a $3 charge for any substitution, yet, our request was rejected by the manager/chef/kitchen? (Something about servings of sides designated for particular entrees and concern over not having enough to cover expected orders. •My paraphrase) was the reason behind the 4 star rating. Otherwise, the experience was top notch and our server, Raven, was particularly a joy to interact with.

name: Johnny Barnes
text: Great drinks and food. Pricy. $80 for salad, pasta, and two drinks. All were outstanding

name: Pop's Garage
text: Too pricey for my taste... But that's just me... If you want well-prepared and American fare I don't mind spending a little extra then I recommend this place.

name: Rinda Wynn
text: Central was magical! Attended a holiday wedding there. The decor was beautiful, the food was gourmet and scrumptious, and the staff did everything possible to make it a fabulous night for the bride and groom, and everyone else. It couldn't have been more perfect!

name: H. Lamont Gourdine
text: Awesome place!  Love the location.  If you come to Montgomery, I would recommend you come here.  Fantastic ambience, knowledgeable staff, and GREAT FOOD!

name: Lamar Jackson
text: Great service. Beautiful atmosphere. High quality and delicious food. Unique choices. I'll be back. I'll bring others:)

name: H. Lamont Gourdine
text: Awesome place!  Love the location.  If you come to Montgomery, I would recommend you come here.  Fantastic ambience, knowledgeable staff, and GREAT FOOD!

name: Lamar Jackson
text: Great service. Beautiful atmosphere. High quality and delicious food. Unique choices. I'll be back. I'll bring others:)

name: Stephen Marlette
text: Pretty much the best restaurant in downtown Montgomery. Our servers were outstanding.  Very friendly, very engaging and fun.  The food is a pleasant surprise. Great wood-burning oven. Try this place, you won't be disappointed.

name: Melissa Bischoping
text:
Spent our anniversary dinner here and had an absolutely wonderful time!  Elegant, but not stuffy, farm-to-table experience.  Service was perfectly timed, wine and cocktail menus comprehensive. Our server, Gaby, was phenomenal- she recommended absolutely delectable choices from each section of the menu and made us feel more like old friends than new customers. We greatly appreciated not only her recommendations (the short rib is FANTASTIC and melt in your mouth) but also her friendly smile.

Dont miss the charcuterie board or the mile high lemon merengue pie!

name: Tricia Nichols
text: We were upstairs for a private event. The room, food and staff were outstanding.  Our only concern was the really sketchy elevator.

name: Alan Watson
text: Central is the go to for top notch dining in Montgomery. We come here whenever we visit. Food is excellent and diverse, service is on point. I asked for flowers on the table because it was my wife's birthday and of course they handled it. Can't miss experience. We love it.

name: Mark Self
text: Service and food was great..Foie Gras as the appetizer with blackberries off the chart. Fresh catch was grouper and amazing sitting on top of greens and hopping John's. Scallops were over a bed of risotto seasoned very well.

name: Dallas Gamble
text: Great service and food...2x and both times been happy

name: A. S.R.
text: Good food, nice space, awesome service (shoutout to Val!)

name: Derrick J. Washington
text: Cozy atmosphere, helpful and engaging staff,  on addition to an accommodating menu choices.

name: Roneika Martin
text: Perfect! I loved the atmosphere! The drinks and desserts were amazing.

name: Tim O
text:
I heard the food was good. Went there. 7 open tables. Hosts was so rude. I say 3 and she goes well you will have to wait we have reservations and I have no idea when you will be seated.
I asked can we sit at the bar she replies it’s all full as you can see.
There was 2 tables open in the bar area.
We left.
Went to Wintzells across the street 5 stars for food and service.

name: Kelli Alfreds
text: Brandy C. Was awesome as usual! Food and service were divine!

name: John Jones
text: This place was so good.  Great service, delicious food, and tasty cocktails.  What more could you possibly want from a dinner spot?

name: Jeff Covington
text: Great meal. Exceptional service. Crayfish Succotash was outstanding!

name: Mary Fitzpztrick
text: A great upscale American restaurant.

name: Carlton Merriweather
text: Nice charming atmosphere! The food was great!

name: Anne Stokes
text: This was the best restaurant I experienced on a recent trip to Montgomery- very highly recommend!

name: Shepherd Waits
text: Went here for our anniversary and experienced great food and service. Our server Tanner was very helpful and made an excellent recommendation on the Fett Sow Fries which my girlfriend loved. 5 stars, will be back soon.

name: Trey Martin
text: Modern chill atmosphere with great bartenders service.

name: Shannon Dean
text: We attended the Mother's Day brunch and it was awesome!  The food and service were excellent.  Although they were extremely busy our drinks were constantly refreshed.  I will be back.

name: Jefferson Rondolfo
text: The best place at Montgomery. Great food and drink.

name: Antoin Williams
text: The food was delicious. The customer service was excellent. The valet was also a nice one. The environment is very relaxing for a romantic evening.

name: Scott Telofski
text: Wife loved her scallops, and the bone-in pork chop was awesome.  Good beer/drink selection, and VERY good service.  Sat near the kitchen and you can really see a well run kitchen.  Even Gordon Ramsey would probably approve.

name: Monica Dennis
text: Oustanding food, beautiful atmosphere, great service. One of the best meals I've had in the last 10 years.

name: Yolanda Jones
text: Place is very beautiful and elegant, especially for high end parties or weddings

name: James Warren
text: Disappointed in the smaller menu.  Love the atmosphere, but not a fan of this menu that is all gourmet. Will have to remove this from my list of favorite places for dinner.  At least the lunch menu still has some more regular things that I like.

name: Brad Dugan
text: Great atmosphere and service. It's not $30 and under as I saw when we went and there's no kids menu. Wonderful for a special occasion or date night!

name: Melissa Letts
text: Happy Anniversary to us!! Dinner was beyond amazing!!! If you go to Central in Montgomery, ask for Howard H as your server!!! He was an amazing server, so accommodating and very sweet to us! This dinner was so epic!!! This is one anniversary dinner for the books ya'll!!! So delicious and well put together!

name: John
text: This place has a great interior and really nice atmosphere. The open kitchen is fun to watch. The only problem I had was the portions seemed a little small and over priced. The taste wasn't all there either. But in all probably the healthiest (in terms of organic, fresh, farm to table food) you can find in Montgomery

name: Geoffrey Walker
text: Outstanding service... Great atmosphere. Really nice dinner. 4.5 with 5 being extremely difficult to obtain, but no real reason not to give 5. Great.

name: Mike Wall
text: The level of service was exceptional.  They were very attentive to our needs.  The food was delicious and unique.

name: Jay Moo
text: Central always delivers something new and interesting. I've never been disappointed by the food I've ordered and they make excellent cocktails. The staff is always friendly and they never seem as overwhelmed as other restaurants that stay as busy as Central. Walking distance to a lot of entertainment in the area, hotels, etc.

name: Robert Jones
text: Kind staff, great recommendations, INCREDIBLE food. Would recommend!

name: Stephan Graff
text: Delicious food and good variety. Tasteful elegance that's affordable. Has originality and comfort all in one. Will go back!

name: Anna K
text: Always an enjoyable time at Central! The atmosphere and service make it feel like a real night out on the town and the food is icing on the cake! I always try one or two starters and new wines when we go for dinner.

name: pinkcufflynx
text: It was one of THE BEST dining experiences we have had in a very long time! My fiance and I shared our birthday dinner here after having a horrible experience elsewhere. When I walked through the door to see about reservations, I was greeted with smiles and pleasant personalities. We came back at our reservation time, was immediately seated. Our waitress (Raven) came right over, introduced herself and made menu recommendations based on our dietary needs. Her personality was awesome! The wine, food and desserts were all delicious! We will definitely be back!

name: Nichole Woodburn
text: Not only was the food innovative and fantastic, but the server was lovely. I loved the introduction of the historical building at the beginning of the meal and the kind note on the receipt after the meal was done. If you are looking for a place to treat yourself, you have come to the right place.  The new chef there is fantastic! I absolutely loved my meal.

name: Jim Sidick
text: Food and service were great. This was my second time there in a month.

name: Barton Dobbs
text:
This place delivered in a big way once again. I am only in Montgomery once a year but last year and this year I had a truly memorable meal and experience! Service was attentive and very professional. The food, from the hush puppies to the roasted okra salad to the wonderful "Butcher's Hangar Steak," was fantastic. The steak was marinated in Latin/Mexican spices and placed on top of a great mole sauce along with fried plantains. A great meal. The wine was awesome, too,  and the server recommended a Washington Cab to go along with the steak.

Central is top to bottom one of my favorite restaurants in the entire country. I travel a lot for work and I haven't found a place that delivers as consistently as this place does. Great work Central!

name: Christopher Hartford
text: Super friendly staff. Very good food. Prices are a bit high, but seems totally worth it to me.

name: Dustin Current
text: Food and Service was Excellent! Thankyou Brandy

name: Patrick Hilden
text: Excellent food and great service. Real gem!

name: Kayla Stojak
text: Surf and turf was great, my husband's NY strip was great, service was awesome and dessert, the vanilla bean creme brulee was amazing! Thanks Central! One of the best spots in Montgomery

name: Ingrid D'Anna
text: GREAT food and service!!! Howard and Gaby are the BEST!!

name: E B
text: Five Stars!!!

name: Kenny Hollinhead
text: Service was excellent, food was out of this world. I proposed to the woman I love here and the atmosphere was perfect. The manager or owner picked up our desert as a gift to us Ann's they have us glasses of complimentary champagne. Overall a great experience.

name: Vanessa James
text: I forget what our waiters name was but I thoroughly enjoyed her! I went during lunch hours and my meal was excellent and the desert was even better !omg and i found out that the same booth I sat in , Oprah WINFREY was in the exact same spot for dinner last week !!! Man was I overjoyed.  Good food, great service,  mature environment,  and a celeb or 2 will pop in on occasion.  Visit well with it !

name: Mario Stylianou
text: Great atmosphere, good food. The bartender was friendly and moderately attentive. The chef needs to tweak his recipes or hone his skills as there is room for improvement but this is a great start for fine dining in Montgomery, Alabama.

name: Ellen H.
text: Seriosly - the gourmet Mother's Day Buffet is fabulous! This is the 3rd year in a row my son has taken me there. Yes, the price is "high end", but so is the food! The variety is amazing & sooooo interesting. It seems there is always something there I've never had before like the roasted baby squash this year as one of several vegatable choices (yummy!). The meat/protein choices are always a treat! I can cook good food at home, but honestly - I've never had food anywhere that tasted better than what they offer at Central. And the atmosphere- it's a one-of-a-kind place... interesting, classy, and comfortable. I always feel very much at home there & received great service!

name: mallorie gray
text: The food was amazing to say the least, and the environment was beautiful!!! The service was absolutely horrible, our order wasn't put in until 20 minutes after we ordered. The two tables that came in behind us ordered got their food and paid before our food came out! The staff kept staring and making it unbelievably obvious that we were the topic of their conversation! I will not be back due to the service, I am disgusted by the treatment I received over others!

name: Mara Smith
text: Really enjoyed our first experience here. Went for dinner during Second Saturday festivities and had no problems with parking and getting there. Waitress (Courtney) was very helpful and attentive. For two, the bill was about $80 (snack, soup, two dinners, and dessert) before tip and we were very full and had some to take home. Side note: The honey goat cheese was amazing! Try it.

name: Jamie Pitts
text: Really good desserts. I really enjoyed it

name: Jay R North
text: We came here for our wedding anniversary.  The appetizers were ok, not nearly as good as they should have been. The drinks lacked flavor. What made this a 4 star instead of a 3 star is the main course was fantastic. Tasted really good and just melted in our mouths.

name: M
text: Service and food was good.  Our server, Autumn, gave us the history of the building and talked about the fact that their ingredients are locally sourced so the menu changes regularly.  Many of the tables and other furniture in the restaurant was reclaimed from the building. They've got a good selection of wines and spirits as well.  If you're going to get desert go for the chef's doughnut if they have it.

name: Steven Hathcote
text: We went for the Mother's Day Buffet for the second year year in a row and it was just as good as the first . It is expensive however I think it is worth it. They had salmon pork some beef potato fingerlings and banana pudding that was outstanding. I would definitely go again five stars all the way!

name: Eric and Misty Butts
text: This place is amazing! Atmosphere was great, perfect location and great food. Although the pork jowl bacon and sweet corn bread were the suggested fare, we thought it was too sweet. If you want a variety of flavor to start, go with the southern relish board, fantastic! Our mains were the salmon and duck quarters, both were amazing. You will not be disappointed. Definitely well go back next time we are in town.

name: Jerry Hagerty
text: Excellent

resp.text: That's great to hear! Thanks for the taking the time to let us know. We hope to see you again very soon!

name: Tamara Taylor North
text: Came to this restaurant for our anniversary. Our server, Brandi, was amazing! But while half of what we ordered was delicious, the other half paled in comparison. LOVED the Old Montgomery cocktail, popcorn chicken appetizer, crisp brussel sprouts, and NY strip.

name: Ryan McDaniel
text: Outstanding restaurant in downtown Montgomery -- a real sign of what this town could be at its best. The food and service are universally excellent. This time we were helped by Jason, whose service really rose above: the perfect mix of personable and professional, with a thorough knowledge of the menu and exquisite timing. The rest of the service team worked like a well-oiled machine and kept the whole restaurant (including our table, backing up Jason) running smoothly. Very strongly recommend this place.

text: Amazing food. Terrific service. I will bring the hubby soon for a date night ♡

text: Way too expensive for a small portion of fatty roast beef! And, room was COLD and very uncomfortable.

name: Evelyn Ruiz
text: Montgomery seems to have a blossoming foodie scene and I'd put Central at the center of it. My colleagues and I happened by accidentally and we're glad we did. I started with the radicchio salad which was delicious if a bit large. I followed it with the the filet mignon (for the brussels sprouts, really!). It was prepared exactly as ordered and delicious. The staff was friendly and really made us feel at home. I appreciated that so much of the food was regionally sourced. Everything was fresh and great tasting. Definitely put this on your list if you are eating in downtown Montgomery.

text: Great food, affordable pricing, good southern hospitality.

I had a ribeye and my wife had filet, both good.

Mixed drinks and beer were good, but wine wasn't worth the high price for a really short pour.

Overall, a great experience!

text:
My wife and I decided to eat here for our 15th anniversary with some friends.
The service was great and the food tasted ok but dinner entree sizes were EXTREMELY  disappointing. Like kids meal size. I have no issue paying $35 for an entree but I would at least like to get close to full. $100 later we left starving and all went to another restaurant to eat... again. Nice place but for what it’s worth Montgomery has better to offer.

name: Sarah Strickland
text: It's gone downhill. The menu items are unoriginal and the quality is poor. Ordered a chicken dish that came out dry, atop a bland carrot puree with shaved iceberg lettuce on top (seriously). I could have made it at home and it would've been better. Also, the majority of the menu items have become more greasy-spoon than anything (burgers, shrimp and grits, etc). The food is bad, but I think they keep getting customers because the atmosphere is nice.

name: Laura Leggin
text: Came for lunch today and service was not great. My first time here was a disappointment. 2 tables that came in after me ate and left by the time I got my food. I was 25 minutes late back to work. I was told items could be taken out of my entree and then when the food came I was told it couldn't. Hope the service gets better.

name: Shawn Lancaster
text: Excellent! Great place to take a date!

name: Randall F
text:
For this small town, Central can be pricey. For this small town, Central tends to be an anomaly. For this small town, Central should be the first of many.

As I tend to figure in all associated costs when it comes to any activity, eating can be expensive or cheap depending on the health factors, risks and bills that can occur when the cumulative costs are acknowledged. That $1 budget burger, done daily or even just a few times a week for most of your life can both shorten your life as well as make the end of it less a life and more an existence that nevertheless reaches into the high six figures to keep existing.

That stated, I greatly appreciate Central because the costs are relatively low for a couple to enjoy dinner and some drinks while being with walking distance of the riverfront, a few pubs, and a whole host of other activities. It's taken Montgomery more than three decades to become MGM, and while I wish it had become much more in my absence, it's nevertheless rather pleasant — and I feel that Central is integral to it.

The atmosphere can be somewhat cozy or right out in the open. The prices are good, the food is great, and the service is just right in that they are present but not hovering. Whether it's a plate of h'ordeuvres (such as the pimento and flat bread) at the bar, or the kale & brussels Caesar salad (done well with a proper massage and sauté of the kale, and brussels like one has rarely known them!), or something else, it's always wonderful.

text: Excellent atmosphere, service and lunch was superb.

text: This place is aborable! If you are looking for ambiance, this is your place.  The service is outstanding and the food is tasty.  Good sized portions!  The pork belly is a must have.  If you are in Montgomery you must eat at Central!

name: chassidy rentz
text: This review is based on my experience reserving a private room for a Company Holiday Party. First of all, the reservation experience was superb. Alyssa was awesome... great communication. The problem was the actual event. First, I paid for valet parking for the event because I knew it was going to be raining. However, a few people in our party had to park their own cars because the young men working valet did not know how to drive a stick. The next issue was the bar menu was not even close to what I had chosen and the prices were higher than the paperwork I was given. Our menu choices were salmon or peppercorn crusted ny strip. The salad was extremely small and had no cucumber. Some people had 1 half of 1 cherry tomato in theirs and some people had 3 or 4 halves. It was very inconsistent. All of the food was lukewarm, and the sides were anemic, almost non-existent. I heard several people comment they were going to get something else to eat on the way home. The steak, which was supposed to be peppercorn crusted, was barely even seasoned. At roughly $50 a plate after tax and fees I expected so much better. I was honestly a little embarrassed. The dessert was good, but the coffee had a burnt taste. The room was decorated nicely and the service was good.

name: Alexius Lovett
text: Today is my birthday. And after driving over four hours to Montgomery checking in to my hotel and still running behind the staff at central was AMAZING! The second we pulled up we had a guy working very hard to get the valet line down. He was running back and forth but too the time out to help us...nodding and smiling and giving us directions since i personally haven't been to Montgomery before. Then we walked in a gentleman opened the door and i was greeted by two you g girls who must have drank happy juice that morning because they we fantastic!!! Greeted me with a smile. I explained that i was late and greatly apologized...but they understood!! My boy friend is a pretty simple guy...pizza is his go to quick meal basically lol. So him walking into this restaurant made him shocked. (He didn't know i planned to come here lol). Any ways he wasn't so happy. We sat down and looked over the menu with Patrick as our waiter. I order some crab and my boyfriend the salmon, but after recieveing his order he didn't like it. (I tried it....and lived it...so i understand we have different taste buds) the manager brandy came over and did her best with his next order.... Some white fish with some fries as simple as it gets made with salt and pepper. He was worried that he might not like this one and she said she wouldn't charge him if he doesn't like it. I asked her to bring the sauce that comes with it even though he originally didn't want it. He tried it and said he didnt like it. She apologized and he informed her that he would still pay since he was amazed at how she handled his problem. I made him try the special sauce and then he was ECSTATIC!! He called her over and said he cant believe the difference! He cleaned his plate!!! I'm defiantly coming back!!! I've never dealt with such a fantastic staff before!!! Thank you thank you for giving a great ending to a fantastic birthday weekend!!!!

text:
Lovely atmosphere. Great place to have an upscale - but not at all stuffy - dinner. Located in downtown Montgomery a few steps from Equal Justice museum which is great and informative itself. Restaurant staff was nice. Suggested reservations bc it can get busy. Open kitchen. Lovely decor.

Had charcuterie. Only suggestion would be to serve with breads not toasted as hard. Substituted saltines; unconventional, but it worked. Oyster app was flavorful. Choc mousse desert was enuf for 2. I typically don't like farm raised salmon, but this was really tasty, nicely prepared soft on inside but crispy outside.

Not cheap but expected and reasonable for this type of service and atmosphere. We shared 2 apps, a salad, and entree and dessert a la mode = $110. Would return.
